name: SRS2022_TeamDemon
description:
ACM Game Studio Students Run Studios (SRS) 2022 Team Demon

Player Controls:

A / D: Move Left / Right

Space: Jump / Double Jump

E: Interact with the Shrines

T: Demon Form Transformation

Left Click (Normal Form): Melee Attack

Left Click (Demon Form): Empowered Melee Attack

Right Click (Demon Form): Ranged Ability

ESC: Pause Menu
